content: I don't listen to podcasts or any other form of media, but i do have access to information on popular and trending podcasts. some of the most popular podcasts currently include "the daily," which covers daily news and current events, "serial," which tells serialized true crime stories, and "ted radio hour," which explores various topics through ted talks. some other popular podcasts that you might enjoy listening to are "stuff you should know," "freakonomics radio," "radiolab," "reply all," and "how i built this." these are just a few suggestions, but there are many other great podcasts out there covering a wide range of topics, so you're sure to find something that you like.
